description: SagaEVM chainlet paused at block height 6593800 due to Ethermint codebase vulnerability. Cross-chain activity restricted while mitigation implemented.
intervention_notes: Protocol team paused entire chainlet, coordinated with Cosmos Labs and Sherlock for remediation. Full post-mortem published.

description: Oracle manipulation via share price oracle using 280M USDC flash loan. MEV bots front-ran attacker, capturing most funds.
intervention_notes: Delegated Body triggered recovery mode, paused all Machines. Negotiated with MEV operators for fund recovery.

description: Polycule trading bot contract vulnerability exploited. Team immediately took bot offline and committed to treasury compensation.
intervention_notes: Immediate response: bot taken offline, vulnerability identified, patches scheduled, full treasury compensation promised.

notes: IPOR Fusion legacy vault exploit. Missing fuse validation. Team remediated through fuse controls.

description: EIP-7702 delegation vulnerability in legacy USDC Fusion Optimizer vault. Attacker created malicious circuit-breaker contract to extract funds.
intervention_notes: Funds recovered with 10% white-hat bounty agreement. IPOR DAO covering deficit, full compensation for affected depositors.

description: User private keys compromised, resulting in unauthorized transfers. Ongoing theft detected by SlowMist.
intervention_notes: Team initially denied issues but later provided 100% compensation to affected users.

description: Multisig governance compromise led to unauthorized contract upgrade and theft of WIP, USDC, WETH, stIP, vIP tokens.
intervention_notes: Immediate suspension of all operations, full investigation initiated. Story Protocol infrastructure unaffected.

description: Counterfeit Token Minting / Access Control
intervention_notes: Isolated Recovery approach: validators halted network, restricted only affected accounts. CGC authorized burns. 87.96B FLOW duplicated (~7B nominal), 99.25% recovered.

description: Hard Fork / Governance Recovery
intervention_notes: Governance-approved hard fork ~30 days after initial exploit. Soft fork froze funds, hard fork redistributed $9.4M. Monerium/Stakewise protected â‚¬3M+.

description: Libra II governance conflict - $61.5M lost through legal/governance speed conflict, DeFi protocol affected by regulatory and governance issues
intervention_notes: Libra II DeFi protocol affected by legal/governance speed conflict. $61.5M lost through regulatory and governance issues. No recovery possible.

description: Emergency multisig (7 members) executed 90-minute recovery operation after Balancer V2 exploit. Burned 5,041 osETH ($19M) and 13,495 osGNO ($1.7M) from attacker, re-minted to DAO. 75% of stolen osTokens recovered. Followed by SWIP-37 to renounce contract ownership.
intervention_notes: Emergency multisig (7 members) executed 90-minute recovery operation after Balancer V2 exploit. Burned 5,041 osETH ($19M) and 13,495 osGNO ($1.7M) from attacker, re-minted to DAO. 75% of stolen osTokens recovered. Followed by SWIP-37 to renounce contract ownership.

description: $94.8M exploit via CSP rounding bug (v5 hacked). Hypernative detected at 07:52 UTC; CSPv6 paused at 08:07 UTC ($19.3M protected). StakeWise recovered $21.8M, whitehats $4.6M. Total $45.7M protected/recovered.
intervention_notes: $94.8M exploit via CSP rounding bug (v5 hacked). Hypernative detected at 07:52 UTC; CSPv6 paused at 08:07 UTC ($19.3M protected). StakeWise recovered $21.8M, whitehats $4.6M. Total $45.7M protected/recovered.

description: Precision Loss / Copy-paste bug
intervention_notes: Validators coordinated 30-hour network halt. White-hat cooperation recovered all $12.8M+ via pre-signed transactions. Emergency hard-fork executed.

description: Sonic Labs deployed freezeAccount (commit b584c86) ~2hrs after exploit. Beets affected pools: stS/S, wOS/S. Freeze was effective for native $S tokens (21.5% of total value), but permit bypass allowed moving stS tokens. Total value at risk: $4.07M. $3.2M lost, $0.87M frozen.
intervention_notes: Sonic Labs deployed freezeAccount (commit b584c86) ~2hrs after exploit. Beets affected pools: stS/S, wOS/S. Freeze was effective for native $S tokens (21.5% of total value), but permit bypass allowed moving stS tokens. Total value at risk: $4.07M. $3.2M lost, $0.87M frozen.

description: Phemex exchange breach - $37M stolen through security compromise, centralized exchange affected by access control vulnerability
intervention_notes: Phemex centralized exchange compromised through access control breach. $37M stolen through security vulnerability. Limited recovery.

description: SwissBorg exchange breach - $41.5M stolen through security compromise, Solana-based exchange affected by access control vulnerability
intervention_notes: SwissBorg Solana exchange compromised through security breach. $41.5M stolen through access control vulnerability. Limited recovery.

description: UXLink governance exploit - $41M stolen through voting manipulation, cross-chain protocol exploited via governance attack
intervention_notes: UXLink cross-chain protocol exploited through governance voting manipulation. $41M stolen through admin coup. No recovery.

description: BtcTurk private key breach - $54M stolen through hot wallet compromise, Turkish exchange security failure
intervention_notes: BtcTurk Turkish exchange compromised through private key breach. $54M stolen through hot wallet security failure. Limited recovery.

description: CrediX access control - $4.5M stolen through private key compromise, exchange security breach
intervention_notes: CrediX exchange compromised through access control vulnerability. $4.5M stolen through private key breach. Limited recovery.

notes: WOO X phishing breach (M). North Korean group access. Team detected 9 account drains in 110 mins and suspended platform-wide withdrawals.

description: CoinDCX coordinated access control breach - $44.3M stolen through security compromise, Indian exchange affected by coordinated attack
intervention_notes: CoinDCX Indian exchange compromised through coordinated access control breach. $44.3M stolen through security vulnerability.

description: BigONE exchange access control - $28M stolen through private key compromise, centralized exchange CeFi security failure
intervention_notes: BigONE centralized exchange compromised through access control vulnerability. $28M stolen through private key breach. Limited recovery.

description: GMX exchange security incident - $42M lost through protocol vulnerability, Arbitrum decentralized exchange affected by smart contract bug
intervention_notes: GMX Arbitrum decentralized exchange affected by security incident. $42M lost through protocol vulnerability. Limited recovery.

description: Built to hedge depeg risk, but depegged from reality by trusting fake token contracts.
intervention_notes: Uniswap v4 hook exploit. Hypernative alerted at 11:43 UTC (4 min after exploit). War room with Spearbit, Quantstamp, Certora. All contracts paused by 12:33 UTC. ~$20M in other vaults protected (est.).

description: ~$223M stolen. Validators froze 2 attacker addresses; 90.9% stake vote authorized recovery into recovery multisig.
intervention_notes: ~$223M stolen. Validators froze 2 attacker addresses; 90.9% stake vote authorized recovery into recovery multisig.

description: ~$8.78M stolen. Attacker exploited tick account manipulation to claim excessive fees. $800k bounty offered; no return observed. 81.8% recovered via negotiation.
intervention_notes: ~$8.78M stolen. Attacker exploited tick account manipulation to claim excessive fees. $800k bounty offered; no return observed. 81.8% recovered via negotiation.

description: UPCX exchange access control - $70M stolen through private key compromise, centralized exchange hot wallet security failure
intervention_notes: UPCX centralized exchange suffered access control compromise. $70M stolen through private key breach. Limited recovery through exchange cooperation.

description: Flash loan price manipulation. Treasury drained.
intervention_notes: Flash loan price manipulation. Treasury drained.

description: Phemex exchange breach - $37M stolen through security compromise, centralized exchange affected by access control vulnerability
intervention_notes: Phemex centralized exchange compromised through access control breach. $37M stolen through security vulnerability. Limited recovery.

description: Polter Finance oracle manipulation - $15.7M stolen through price oracle exploit, Fantom DeFi protocol affected by security vulnerability
intervention_notes: Polter Finance DeFi protocol exploited through oracle manipulation. $15.7M stolen through price oracle vulnerability. Limited recovery.

description: DEXX terminal private key leak (~$30M). Team suspended operations immediately upon detection.
notes: Private key leak during export_wallet requests.
intervention_notes: DEXX terminal private key leak (~$30M). Team suspended operations immediately upon detection.

description: Thala Labs exploit - $25M stolen through smart contract vulnerability, DeFi protocol affected by access control bug
intervention_notes: Thala Labs DeFi protocol exploited through smart contract vulnerability. $25M stolen through access control bug. Limited recovery.

description: Admin wallet private key leak on Arbitrum led to a $5.98M loss.
intervention_notes: $4.75M exploit via claimRewards() vulnerability. Attack began 07:35 UTC, war room assembled by 07:50 UTC. Protocol paused within 10 minutes. Attackers mimicked LFJ contracts to bypass solvency checks. rTKN reimbursement plan implemented for users.

description: M2 exchange access control - $27.4M stolen through private key compromise, centralized exchange affected by security breach
intervention_notes: M2 centralized exchange compromised through access control breach. $27.4M stolen through private key compromise. Limited recovery.

description: Tapioca DAO access control - $4.7M stolen through private key compromise, DeFi protocol affected by security vulnerability
intervention_notes: Tapioca DAO DeFi protocol compromised through access control breach. $4.7M stolen through private key compromise. Limited recovery.

description: Radiant Capital private key compromise - $58M stolen through hot wallet breach, BSC +1 borrowing protocol security failure
intervention_notes: Radiant Capital BSC borrowing protocol compromised through private key breach. $58M stolen through hot wallet security failure. Limited recovery.

description: Bankroll flash loan attack - $230K stolen through economic exploit, DeFi protocol exploited via flash loan vulnerability
intervention_notes: Bankroll DeFi protocol exploited through flash loan attack. $230K stolen through economic vulnerability. No recovery.

description: BingX centralized exchange breach - $52M stolen through access control compromise, CeFi exchange security failure
intervention_notes: BingX centralized exchange suffered access control compromise. $52M stolen through security breach. Limited recovery.

description: Indodax private key breach - $47M stolen through hot wallet compromise, Indonesian exchange affected by security vulnerability
intervention_notes: Indodax Indonesian exchange compromised through private key breach. $47M stolen through hot wallet security failure. Limited recovery.

description: Truflation access control - $5M stolen through private key compromise, oracle protocol affected by security breach
intervention_notes: Truflation oracle protocol compromised through access control breach. $5M stolen through private key compromise. Limited recovery.

description: Penpie reentrancy attack - $27M stolen through smart contract vulnerability, DeFi yield farming protocol exploited via logic bug
intervention_notes: Penpie yield farming protocol exploited through reentrancy vulnerability. $27M stolen through smart contract bug. No recovery achieved.

notes: Solana ELF address alignment vulnerability. Coordinated private patch (Signer Set) prevented exploit.

description: India's largest exchange had its Safe multisig breached. 45% of customer assets ($235M) were drained. Attributed to Lazarus Group.
intervention_notes: WazirX Indian exchange compromised through multisig vulnerability. $235M stolen through blind signing attack. Limited recovery.

description: BtcTurk private key breach - $54M stolen through hot wallet compromise, Turkish exchange security failure
intervention_notes: BtcTurk Turkish exchange compromised through private key breach. $54M stolen through hot wallet security failure. Limited recovery.

description: Exploit involving tick manipulation and flash loans across multiple chains.
intervention_notes: Exploit involving tick manipulation and flash loans across multiple chains.

description: Team rugged investors by diverting $33M in bridged funds to their own wallets instead of returning them to users.
intervention_notes: ZKasino gaming protocol exploited through malicious rug pull. $33M stolen through exit scam. No recovery possible.

description: Munchables in-house exploit - $62.5M stolen through rogue developer attack, Blast network gaming protocol compromised by internal team member
intervention_notes: Munchables Blast network gaming protocol exploited by rogue developer. $62.5M stolen through in-house exploit. Internal security failure led to complete loss.

notes: Vulnerability in V6 callback. Team stopped API and whitehats rescued .4M in approved tokens.

description: Shido access control - $2.4M stolen through private key compromise, DeFi protocol security breach
intervention_notes: Shido DeFi protocol compromised through access control vulnerability. $2.4M stolen through private key breach. No recovery.

description: Seneca access control - $6.5M stolen through private key compromise, DeFi yield aggregator security breach
intervention_notes: Seneca DeFi yield aggregator compromised through private key breach. $6.5M stolen across multiple tokens. Limited recovery.

description: Blueberry Protocol logic bug - $1.4M stolen through smart contract vulnerability, DeFi options protocol exploit
intervention_notes: Blueberry Protocol DeFi options platform exploited through smart contract bug. $1.4M stolen through logic vulnerability. No recovery.

description: Fixed Float exchange breach - $26.13M stolen through access control compromise, centralized exchange hot wallet security failure
intervention_notes: Fixed Float centralized exchange suffered access control compromise. Hot wallet security breach led to $26.13M loss across multiple cryptocurrencies.

description: BEAM token phishing - $5.17M stolen through social engineering, coordinated phishing attack on BEAM token holders
intervention_notes: Coordinated phishing attack targeting BEAM token holders. $5.17M stolen through social engineering. Limited recovery.

description: Duelbits exchange access control - $4.64M stolen through private key compromise, gaming platform security breach
intervention_notes: Duelbits gaming platform suffered access control compromise. $4.64M stolen through private key breach. No recovery possible.

description: PlayDapp private key compromise - $32.35M stolen through phishing attack, unauthorized minting of 1.79B PLA tokens in two attacks 72 hours apart
intervention_notes: Private key compromise via phishing led to unauthorized minting of 1.79B PLA ($290M) across two attacks (Feb 9 10:39 PM and Feb 12 10:09 PM UTC+9). Team failed to detect first attack until second attack occurred 72 hours later. Hacker paused contract on Feb 13 11:05 AM UTC+9 (85 hours after first attack). Only $32M was liquidated before exchanges froze deposits. Migration to PDA with KYC/AML checks implemented.

description: MIMSpell precision loss vulnerability - $65M stolen through rounding bug in DeFi lending protocol, exploited through mathematical precision error
intervention_notes: Precision loss vulnerability in MIMSpell protocol allowed exploitation of rounding errors. Hacker exploited mathematical precision bug to drain funds. No recovery possible due to nature of exploit.

description: GAMEE token access control - $16.35M stolen through private key compromise, Polygon gaming token security breach
intervention_notes: GAMEE gaming token on Polygon compromised through private key breach. $16.35M in GMEE tokens stolen. Partial recovery through exchange intervention.

description: Socket bridge vulnerability - $3.3M stolen through incorrect validation, cross-chain bridge protocol security breach
intervention_notes: Socket cross-chain bridge protocol exploited through validation vulnerability. $3.3M stolen across multiple chains. No recovery.

description: Socket Gateway validation bug - $3.3M stolen through incorrect validation, bridge gateway protocol vulnerability
intervention_notes: Socket Gateway protocol exploited through validation vulnerability. $3.3M stolen through bridge attack. No recovery.

description: Radiant Capital private key compromise - $58M stolen through hot wallet breach, BSC +1 borrowing protocol security failure
intervention_notes: Radiant Capital Arbitrum lending pool exploited through smart contract vulnerability. $4.5M stolen through logic bug. Partial recovery through protocol pause.

description: Aurory SyncSpace exploit (~$830k). Team detected unusual activity and disabled bridge to contain breach.
intervention_notes: Aurory SyncSpace exploit (~$830k). Team detected unusual activity and disabled bridge to contain breach.

description: Herencia Artife NFT exploit - $29.6M stolen through smart contract vulnerability, NFT project affected by minting bug
intervention_notes: Herencia Artife NFT project exploited through smart contract vulnerability. $29.6M stolen through minting bug. Limited recovery.

description: bZx phishing attack - $55M stolen through private key compromise, DeFi lending protocol exploited through social engineering
intervention_notes: bZx DeFi lending protocol compromised through phishing attack. $55M stolen through private key breach. Limited recovery through investigation.

description: KyberSwap flash loan attack - $45.3M stolen through economic exploit, DeFi exchange protocol exploited via flash loan manipulation
intervention_notes: KyberSwap DeFi exchange exploited through flash loan attack. $45.3M stolen through economic vulnerability. Limited recovery.

description: dYdX v3 insurance fund loss following coordinated manipulation of SUSHI and YFI markets.
intervention_notes: dYdX v3 insurance fund used to cover $9M bad debt after YFI price manipulation. Parameters adjusted post-incident.

description: Onyx Protocol precision loss - $7.6M stolen through empty market attack, DeFi protocol exploited via Compound v2 fork vulnerability
intervention_notes: Onyx Protocol DeFi protocol exploited through precision loss vulnerability. $7.6M stolen through empty market attack. No recovery.

vector_category: Seed Phrase Theft / Password Manager Breach
description: LastPass users crypto theft - $37M stolen through password manager breach, crypto users affected by credential theft
intervention_notes: LastPass password manager breach led to $37M crypto theft through seed phrase compromise. Multiple users affected. Limited recovery.

description: CoinEx private key compromise - $54.3M stolen through hot wallet breach, centralized exchange security failure
intervention_notes: CoinEx centralized exchange compromised through private key breach. $54.3M stolen through hot wallet security failure. Limited recovery.

description: Stake hot wallet breach - $41M stolen through private key compromise, centralized exchange affected by security vulnerability
intervention_notes: Stake centralized exchange compromised through hot wallet breach. $41M stolen through private key compromise. Limited recovery.

description: Exactly Protocol DebtManager exploit - .6M lost before protocol-wide pause. Signer set executed pause to prevent copycat attacks.
notes: Exactly Protocol pause managed to block most operations but copycats still exploited the withdraw function which was un-pausable. Still, the primary exploit vector was contained.
intervention_notes: Exactly Protocol paused all markets (except withdrawals) via Signer Set multisig. Time to contain: 114 mins.

description: Curve Vyper compiler reentrancy - $69M stolen through compiler bug, DeFi protocol exploited via smart contract compilation vulnerability
intervention_notes: Curve DeFi protocol exploited through Vyper compiler reentrancy bug. $69M stolen through smart contract vulnerability. No recovery possible due to nature of exploit.

description: AlphaPo private key compromise - $60M stolen through hot wallet breach, centralized exchange security failure affecting multiple assets
intervention_notes: AlphaPo centralized exchange compromised through private key breach. $60M stolen through hot wallet security failure. Limited recovery.

description: Poly Network bridge exploit - $27.3M stolen through cross-chain vulnerability, bridge protocol exploited via smart contract bug
intervention_notes: Poly Network cross-chain bridge exploited through smart contract vulnerability. $27.3M stolen through bridge exploit. Partial recovery.

description: Euler Finance flash loan attack - $200M stolen through DeFi lending protocol vulnerability, exploited through donation mechanism bug allowing unlimited borrowing
intervention_notes: Flash loan attack exploited donation mechanism. Hacker "Jacob" returned nearly all funds (~$197M) after negotiations with Euler allies and law enforcement bluffs. Full user reimbursement achieved through whitehat cooperation.

notes: Raydium admin key compromise (.2M). Attacker used withdraw_pnl. Team revoked authority in 244 mins.
Solend USDH oracle manipulation (.26M). Team set LTV to 0 in 26 mins from detection.

description: Deribit hot wallet breach - $28M stolen through private key compromise, cryptocurrency derivatives exchange affected by security vulnerability
intervention_notes: Deribit derivatives exchange compromised through hot wallet breach. $28M stolen through private key compromise. Limited recovery through investigation.

notes: Tulip exposure to Mango exploit (.5M loss). Team suspended affected strategy module.
UXD exposure to Mango exploit (M loss). Team suspended minting (Module skip) immediately.

description: Mango Markets oracle manipulation - $115M stolen through price oracle manipulation, attacker used massive USDC deposit to manipulate oracle prices and drain platform
intervention_notes: Oracle manipulation attack. Community governance recovered ~70% of funds through negotiation with attacker.

description: BNB Chain Bridge hack - IAVL proof vulnerability allowing $586M BNB exploitation, bridge suspended for security upgrade
intervention_notes: Attacker forged deposit proofs for a legacy block on the Beacon Chain to mint 2M BNB on BSC.

description: Wintermute private key compromise - $160M stolen through vanity address attack, market maker hot wallet breach using Profanity wallet generator vulnerability
intervention_notes: Profanity wallet generator vulnerability exploited. Wintermute worked with exchanges to freeze some funds.

description: Nomad cross-chain bridge hack - $190M stolen through smart contract initialization vulnerability, affected multiple blockchain networks including Ethereum, Moonbeam, and others
intervention_notes: Critical initialization bug allowed unlimited withdrawals. Nomad offered 10% whitehat bounty (keep 90% if returned). ~$36M recovered voluntarily through bounty program. Majority of funds remained lost due to copycat attacks.

description: Flash loan price manipulation. Treasury drained.
Tick account manipulation. Recovered 81.8% via negotiation.
Harmony Horizon Bridge hack - $100M stolen through phishing attack on multi-signature wallet, attackers gained internal server access and installed trojan on employee laptop
intervention_notes: Horizon bridge compromised via phishing attack on 2-of-5 multi-signature wallet. $99.6M stolen, laundered through Tornado Cash/Railgun.

description: Wintermute private key compromise - $160M stolen through vanity address attack, market maker hot wallet breach using Profanity wallet generator vulnerability
intervention_notes: Profanity wallet generator vulnerability exploited. Wintermute worked with exchanges to freeze some funds.

description: Wintermute private key compromise - $160M stolen through vanity address attack, market maker hot wallet breach using Profanity wallet generator vulnerability
intervention_notes: Profanity wallet generator vulnerability exploited. Wintermute worked with exchanges to freeze some funds.

description: EvoDeFi bridge access control - $66M stolen through private key compromise, BSC cross-chain bridge security breach
intervention_notes: EvoDeFi BSC bridge compromised through access control vulnerability. $66M stolen through private key breach. Limited recovery.

description: Scream oracle exploit - $35M stolen through price oracle manipulation, Fantom DeFi lending protocol exploited via oracle vulnerability
intervention_notes: Scream Fantom DeFi lending protocol exploited through oracle manipulation. $35M stolen through price oracle vulnerability.

notes: Fei / Rari Fuse exploit (M). Team paused all DAI borrows to contain the re-entrancy drain.
Saddle Finance Meta-pool exploit (M). BlockSec rescued .8M. Admin paused the pools shortly after.

description: Akutar NFT denial of service - $34M lost through smart contract vulnerability, NFT project affected by minting bug
intervention_notes: Akutar NFT project affected by denial of service vulnerability. $34M lost through smart contract minting bug. No recovery.

description: Attacker used a flash loan to acquire massive voting power (LP tokens), passed an emergency BIP to drain the protocol's assets, and executed it immediately due to the lack of a governance delay.
intervention_notes: Flash loan attack on governance system. Attacker borrowed massive BEAN tokens, passed governance proposal to drain treasury.

notes: Elephant Money exploit (.2M). Team paused minting and redeeming of TRUNK to contain the drain.

description: Attacker compromised 5 of 9 bridge validator nodes (4 Sky Mavis + 1 Axie DAO) to authorize fraudulent withdrawals of 173.6k ETH and 25.5M USDC. The exploit went unnoticed for 6 days.
intervention_notes: Sky Mavis validator nodes compromised via spear-phishing. Attacker gained 5/9 validator keys (4 Sky Mavis + 1 Axie DAO) by exploiting gas-free RPC access. 173,600 ETH + 25.5M USDC ($625M total) drained in two transactions. Discovered 6 days later (Mar 29). $150M recovered through Sky Mavis raising $150M to fully reimburse all affected users. Security upgrades: increased validators to 11+, targeting 21+, zero-trust model, $1M bug bounty.

description: ERC-1155 reentrancy. Team soft-locked Polygon at 66m and paused tokens at 92m, saving $2M extra.
Cashio response. Saber team frozen stablecoin pools in 120 mins.
intervention_notes: Cashio response. Saber team frozen stablecoin pools in 120 mins.

description: Solana-based protocol failed to validate the .mint field for Saber LP tokens, allowing the attacker to provide fake collateral and infinite mint $CASH.
intervention_notes: Cashio Solana stablecoin exploited through mint vulnerability. $48M stolen through smart contract bug. No recovery possible. Team frozen pools via Signer Set.

description: IRA Financial breach - $36M stolen through security compromise, crypto retirement platform affected by access control vulnerability
intervention_notes: IRA Financial crypto retirement platform compromised through security breach. $36M stolen through access control vulnerability.

description: Superfluid context forgery ($13M+ at risk). Team mobilized at 6:48 AM UTC, protocol frozen at 10:54 AM UTC (~4h).
notes: Vulnerability in host contract. Team blocked agreement invocations.
intervention_notes: Superfluid context forgery ($13M+ at risk). Team mobilized at 6:48, deployed host upgrade to revert agreement calls at 10:54 (246 min).

description: Attacker bypassed Solana VAA verification by providing a malicious instructions sysvar account, allowing the fraudulent minting of 120k whETH on Solana.
intervention_notes: Portal bridge exploit; Jump Crypto immediately replenished all 120,000 ETH ($326M) to make users whole. One year later (Feb 21, 2023), Jump Crypto executed counter-exploit via Oasis Multisig to recover $218M collateral from attacker. Full user reimbursement achieved through immediate bailout.

description: SolFire Finance rug pull (~$4.8M). No successful intervention reported.
Crypto.com access control breach - $34.4M stolen through private key compromise, centralized exchange affected by security vulnerability
intervention_notes: Crypto.com centralized exchange compromised through access control breach. $34.4M stolen through private key compromise. Limited recovery.

notes: Jet Protocol array iteration bug (M at risk). Responsible disclosure. Team patched on mainnet within hours of discovery.

description: Fork of Beefy Finance; attacker exploited a missing reentrancy guard in the depositFor() function, using a malicious contract to loop multiple deposits within a single call and claim an outsized share of the vault.
intervention_notes: Grim Finance Fantom yield farming protocol exploited through reentrancy attack. $40M stolen through smart contract vulnerability.

description: Badger DAO front-end compromise via Cloudflare API. Protocol was paused to contain damage.
intervention_notes: Attacker compromised front-end via Cloudflare to inject malicious scripts harvesting user approvals. $120.3M stolen; protocol pause prevented further loss but no recovery achieved.

description: MonoX logic bug - $31.4M stolen through price manipulation, DeFi exchange protocol exploited via smart contract vulnerability
intervention_notes: MonoX DeFi exchange exploited through logic bug. $31.4M stolen through price manipulation vulnerability. No recovery possible.

description: bZx phishing attack - $55M stolen through private key compromise, DeFi lending protocol exploited through social engineering
intervention_notes: bZx DeFi lending protocol compromised through phishing attack. $55M stolen through private key breach. Limited recovery through investigation.

description: Cream Finance CREAM ETH Exchange (... +1 Flash Loan Attack $130,000,000 10.27.2021
intervention_notes: Complex flash loan exploit targeting price calculation of wrappable tokens. Attacker used two addresses to manipulate yUSDVault share price via $500M deposits, borrowed against inflated collateral. Stole $136M, protocol paused v1 markets and disabled wrappable token supply/borrow. Yearn recovered $9.42M 'donated' to yUSD vault during attack. Third exploit for C.R.E.A.M. in 2021.

description: Attacker used a complex multi-transaction exploit to manipulate internal debt numbers in an unreleased sUSD pool, draining funds from the Iron Bank integration.
intervention_notes: Alpha Finance DeFi lending protocol exploited through internal debt manipulation. $37.5M stolen through logic bug. No recovery.

description: Attacker used flash loans to manipulate the VEE/USDC price on Pangolin, tricking the protocol's lending pools into allowing unauthorized withdrawals.
intervention_notes: Vee Finance Avalanche DeFi protocol exploited through oracle manipulation. $36M stolen through price oracle vulnerability.

description: Largest crypto hack to date; attacker exploited a vulnerability in the cross-chain manager to modify the pubKey of consensus nodes, allowing them to authorize massive transfers across 3 chains.
intervention_notes: Poly Network cross-chain bridge exploited through smart contract vulnerability. Whitehat hacker 'Mr. White Hat' returned nearly all funds (~$610M) voluntarily after team communication. Only ~$1M bounty paid. Near-total recovery achieved through whitehat cooperation.

description: Attacker used 8 flash loans to skew the BNB/BUSD and BNB/BUNNY pool prices, allowing them to claim a massive amount of BUNNY and swap it for BNB.
intervention_notes: PancakeBunny yield aggregator exploited through flash loan oracle manipulation. $45M stolen through price oracle vulnerability. No recovery possible.

description: Attacker inflated the pool balance via flash loan before burning LP tokens. The calcLiquidityShare() function used the inflated current balance instead of a cached value, allowing excessive withdrawals.
intervention_notes: Spartan Protocol DeFi protocol exploited through flash loan attack. $30.5M stolen through liquidity share manipulation. No recovery.

description: A typo in the swap function (using 1000 vs 10000) broke the constant product formula check, allowing the attacker to swap 1 wei for 98% of the pool's reserves.
intervention_notes: Uranium Finance DeFi protocol exploited through math error vulnerability. $57.2M stolen through logic bug. No recovery possible.

description: Attacker compromised the founder's machine to steal the mnemonic for the admin key. The attacker drained $6M in stablecoins and ~3M EASY tokens (~$53M) from the protocol treasury.
intervention_notes: EasyFi DeFi lending protocol compromised through admin key theft. $59M stolen through mnemonic breach. No recovery possible.

description: One day after launch on BSC, the developers upgraded the vault implementation to include a backdoor init() function that allowed them to drain 13M BUSD and 73k BNB to their own address.
intervention_notes: Meerkat Finance DeFi protocol exploited through malicious rug pull. $31M stolen through exit scam. No recovery possible.

notes: Primitive Finance vulnerability (.3M at risk). Team executed whitehat rescue and frontend approval reset. 98% saved.

description: Alpha Finance internal debt manipulation - $37.5M stolen through logic bug, DeFi lending protocol exploited via internal debt vulnerability
intervention_notes: Alpha Finance DeFi lending protocol exploited through internal debt manipulation. $37.5M stolen through logic bug. No recovery.

description: Alpha Finance internal debt manipulation - $37.5M stolen through logic bug, DeFi lending protocol exploited via internal debt vulnerability
intervention_notes: Alpha Finance DeFi lending protocol exploited through internal debt manipulation. $37.5M stolen through logic bug. No recovery.

description: Attacker used flash loans to manipulate stablecoin prices in the Curve Y pool, tricking Harvest's vault price calculations into allowing them to withdraw more than they deposited.
intervention_notes: Harvest Finance DeFi yield farming protocol exploited through flash loan oracle manipulation. $33.8M stolen through price oracle vulnerability.

description: Bancor vulnerability - $27.5M stolen through smart contract exploit, DeFi protocol affected by access control vulnerability
intervention_notes: Bancor DeFi protocol exploited through smart contract vulnerability. $27.5M stolen through access control exploit. Limited recovery.

description: VeChain Foundation buyback wallet private key compromise.
intervention_notes: Blocklist implemented via validator software upgrade to freeze 1.1B VET in the attacker address.

description: Zaif hot wallet breach - $60M stolen from Japanese exchange, 5,966 BTC and undisclosed BCH and MonaCoin taken through security vulnerability
intervention_notes: Zaif Japanese exchange compromised through hot wallet vulnerability. $60M stolen including 5,966 BTC. Limited recovery through investigation.

description: Bithumb coordinated attack - $71M stolen in exchange breach with Coinrail, affected XRP and ETH holdings through security compromise
intervention_notes: Bithumb exchange suffered coordinated attack with Coinrail. $71M stolen through security breach affecting XRP and ETH holdings. Limited recovery through exchange cooperation.

description: Theft of 523M NEM tokens from hot wallet; exchange later compensated users.
intervention_notes: Theft of 523M NEM tokens from hot wallet; exchange subsequently compensated affected users using its own funds.

description: NiceHash payment hack - $62M stolen from mining marketplace, 4,736 BTC taken through internal security breach affecting payment processing
intervention_notes: NiceHash mining marketplace compromised through internal security breach. $62M stolen affecting payment processing. Limited recovery through investigation.

description: Tether Treasury wallet key compromise leading to unauthorized minting of USDT.
intervention_notes: Omni Core software update released to blacklist the attacker address, effectively freezing the stolen funds.

description: The DAO reentrancy exploit leading to a contentious hard fork.
intervention_notes: Irregular state change (hard fork) executed to move funds from the 'child DAO' to a withdrawal contract.
